creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Crosby in memory of Mrs. Albert W. Hastings
description: cruet stand with six glass bottles; the stand is oval with sloping rim which becomes wide and pointed at the ends; the base is a concave addition to the rim; the six slender bottles are fluted, and each has a silver collar with a spout which fits snugly around the neck of the bottle and provides a close fitting for the glass stoppers
title: Cruet set
